64.“Yan Changgui tongzhi gei Qinghua jinggangshan zongbu de dianhua

67. “Dui Shanghai wenhua da geming de zhishi” (Directive Regarding the Cul-
turalRevolution inShanghai),12February 1967(MaoZedong 1969,667-672)
See also MacFarquhar and Schoenhals (2006), 168; and “Talks at Three Meetings
withComradesChangCh'un-ch'iao andYaoWen-yuan,”February1967(Schram
1974,277-279); and Xu Jingxian (2004),84-86.Mao said,“Communes are to0
weak when it comes to suppressing counter-revolution” (Schram 1974, 278).
